item.title: Pokemon GO: How To Beat Giovanni In June 2025
item.description:
Giovanni’s Pokemon GO June 2025 Shadow Pokemon roster faced some chances during the Crown Clash Taken Over event. He is the Team GO Rocket Main Boss and possesses some of the most powerful Shadow Pokemon in the game. You must strategize your counters properly to win against Giovanni’s Shadow monsters.

First, you should find Giovanni’s location in Pokemon GO , only by doing so can you battle him. Locating him requires a Super Rocket Radar, which you can get by completing specific Team GO Rocket Special Research quests. Giovanni’s Shadow Pokemon roster has multiple powerhouses, but knowing the lineup can help you select the best counters. That said, this guide details how to beat Giovanni in June 2025.

Pokemon GO - All Giovanni Shadow Pokemon In June 2025

There are five different Shadow Pokemon in Giovanni’s Pokemon GO June 2025 battle roster. He always starts and ends the battle with a fixed Pokemon for each of the 1st and 3rd rounds. The 2nd round is where he has 3 Shadow Pokemon to choose 1 as his representative. Here are all the Giovanni’s Shadow Pokemon for June 2025.

Round

Pokemon

First

Shadow Persian

Second

  • Shadow Rhyperior
  • Shadow Nidoking
  • Shadow Kangaskhan

Third

Shadow Dialga

Pokemon GO: Best Giovanni Counter Team In June 2025

Machamp, Mega Lucario, and Mega Swampert are among some of the best Pokemon GO Giovanni counters for June 2025. Most of Giovanni's Shadow Pokemon share the same weakness to Fighting-type moves; Machamp can inflict notable damage to most of them. Regarding Rhyperior, Nidoking, and Shadow Dialga, you can use Mega Swampert. You can also use Mega Lucario in the last round against Shadow Dialga.

While these are some of the best counters for Giovanni’s Pokemon GO June 2025 roster, you can also use other Legendaries, Shadow, Mega, or Standard Pokemon against his roster.

Pokemon GO - All Giovanni Pokemon Counters In June 2025

The Team GO Rocket Main Boss Giovanni has a total of 5 Shadow Pokemon for a 3-round battle. Since each of these Shadow Pokemon has notable stats and moves, you must study their typing carefully to win. Here are all the Giovanni June 2025 Pokemon GO Shadow Pokemon and their best counters.

item.title: How to Beat All Bosses in Fantasy Life i
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Main Bosses in Fantasy Life i
  • How to Beat Every Boss in Fantasy Life i

As Fantasy Life i allows players to live a slow life as a Woodcutter, Cook, Tailor, and more, there are also Lives that require them to be active in battle, such as the Paladin Life, Magician Life, and more. These are also required to complete the main quests, where you will find yourself in more than a few fights.

Some of these battles will be with strong bosses that are from Level 45 and higher. Taking these bosses on will require a lot of training and making sure you have the right equipment, and Life before you take them on. Here are the best ways to defeat all 6 main bosses in Fantasy Life i .

All Main Bosses in Fantasy Life i

There are many mini-bosses that you can find in Fantasy Life i , but there are a total of 6 main bosses that you will come in contact with during the main story. Here are all of them and their level.

  • Glenn - Level 45
  • Frajeel - Level 50
  • Guardian Hagram - Level 50
  • Eternia Woolie - Level 50
  • Dark Dragon - Level 60
  • Gear-Xernes - Level 60

How to Beat Every Boss in Fantasy Life i

Each of the 6 bosses in Fantasy Life i will require you to be aware of their fighting patterns , prepare with the best equipment and Buddies, and more. Here are some strategies to use with each boss.

How to Beat Glenn in Fantasy Life i

Glenn is the first boss you will need to fight, and will appear during Chapter 6: The Island of Trials. Defeating him is relatively simple. First, make sure you are at least level 45 in one of your Combat Lives. Then, you will want to pay attention to his attack patterns. Glenn uses only one attack when he raises his sword. When he does this, use dodge for the first hit, and make sure to stay away when he uses his combo move. Then, just approach him again and attack.

How to Beat Frajeel in Fantasy Life i

Frajeel is the next boss you will encounter in Chapter 6: The Island of Trials. He will be at level 50 , so make sure you have reached this point in your Combat Life. To start, we recommend applying status effects to Frajeel, especially Paralysis. You can either get a buddy to apply this effect or use the Hunter Life. You can also use your buddies to distract Frajeel and draw his attacks towards them, but make sure you watch their health. You can also wait for him to finish his attack patterns if you are struggling, and get in a few hits when he is resting.

How to Beat Guardian Hagram in Fantasy Life i

Guardian Hagram will appear as the next boss in Chapter 6: The Island of Trials. Just like Frajeel, this boss will be at level 50 . The best way to beat the Guardian Hagram is by making sure to stand behind the boss, as most of its attacks are only aimed at the front. Your chosen buddies in your team will most likely be taking the hits from the Guardian Hagram, while you stand behind and use your combos to take the boss out.

How to Beat Eternia Woolie in Fantasy Life i

Next up is the boss Eternia Woolie in Chapter 7: Crack the Cog, Free Our Future. This boss will also be at level 50 . This boss is relatively simple, and all you will really need to do is just make sure you aren't standing in front of it. There is one particular move it uses where it shoots out a green arrow, and you will need to make sure you are at its side or behind it. Then, just use any attack or combo to deplete its health.

How to Beat Dark Dragon in Fantasy Life i

Dark Dragon will appear in Chapter 7: Crack the Cog, Free Our Future, and will be level 60 . This one is relatively difficult, but you can weaken it beforehand by destroying the wyrmheart found in Fort Gardhart in Ginormosia. This is not a required dungeon, but it will make Dark Dragon much easier to defeat. When you start the battle, make sure to bring along Laura since she uses Light skills, which are strong against the Dark Dragon.

Also, when the Dark Dragon drops bombs on the battlefield, you can attack them to send them back to the boss. The boss will also go into a Heated Phase two times, and during the short period directly after entering the phase, it will be immune to any attacks you deliver. So, make sure not to use any ultimate or charged attacks.

How to Beat Gear-Xernes in Fantasy Life i

Gear-Xernes is the last boss you'll need to defeat in Chapter 7: Crack the Cog, Free Our Future. It will be at level 60 . This boss has a lot of different attacks, and you will need to watch the patterns. You will need to watch its attacks and when it is charging up to make sure you dodge and don't get hit.

There is one attack that uses rotating red beams, and you will need to make sure to get as far away from the boss as possible. This will make the gaps between each beam larger, so you can avoid getting hurt. Finally, we recommend using charged attacks as a Paladin or Mercenary on this boss, especially since they make you immune to damage. This will make it easier to do some damage to Gear-Xernes while it unleashes its many attacks.

Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time
10.0 /10
Released
May 21, 2025

item.title: Roblox: Golf Range Tycoon Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Golf Range Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon
  • How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Golf Range Tycoon is a great business simulator where you will have to develop your own golf empire. Here you will have to build the entire golf course from scratch, and then serve customers to earn money for new improvements and expansions.

As in other Roblox games, in Golf Range Tycoon you can redeem codes that will bring you a lot of freebies and valuable rewards that will be especially useful from the very beginning. Redeeming codes won't take you much time or effort, and you'll get a decent amount of Cash in return, which will serve as a great start-up capital.

Updated June 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Golf Range Tycoon currently has just one active code, but it still provides a helpful boost. Redeeming it will give you 10,000 Cash, which can be useful for upgrading your range. While there aren’t many options right now, more codes may be released in the future. Be sure to check back regularly for the latest updates and new rewards.

All Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Working Golf Range Tycoon Codes

  • HOLEINONE - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.

Expired Golf Range Tycoon Codes

There are currently no expired Golf Range Tycoon codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes is probably the only good way to earn Cash quickly from the very beginning of the game. So, if you have just started playing and don't want to spend too much time on probably the most difficult part - the beginning of the game with zero capital, redeeming codes is exactly what you need.

How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes will take you a few clicks because the developers have made this option easy and accessible. If you have never redeemed a Roblox code before and don't know or understand how it works, please use our guide:

  • Launch Golf Range Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the lower right corner of the screen. There will be a button labeled Redeem Code. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Claim button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the right side of the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

All codes for this Roblox game are first published on the game's official social media pages. Here, developers usually share them along with important announcements or to reward community activity. To save you time, here are all the links:

  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Roblox group.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Discord server.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon X account.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon YouTube channel.
Roblox

item.title: Death Stranding 2 is Poised to Have a Golden Opportunity Metal Gear Solid Didn't
item.description:
For those with a preference for the weird, wacky, and slightly uncomfortable, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is one of the most exciting upcoming games of 2025. The young franchise is strikingly unique and has many clear strengths, but it will always be defined by its connection to Kojima Productions, the breakout studio led by the eponymous Hideo Kojima.

Anyone following Kojima’s work over the past few decades knows that the first Death Stranding represented more than just a studio debut: it was the first Kojima-directed outing since the auteur’s widely publicized falling-out with Konami, where he had served as vice president for many years. During his tenure, he was best known for his work on the seminal Metal Gear franchise, which many argue played a pivotal role in video games becoming more cinematic and story-driven. Indeed, Metal Gear was Kojima’s bread and butter, which made it all the more tragic that he had to give up the series’ reins before it was completed. Kojima left Konami before the release of Metal Gear Solid 5 , a game that is widely considered to be incomplete for this very reason. With Death Stranding 2 , this is unlikely to happen.

Kojima Can Actually Finish Death Stranding, Unlike Metal Gear

Metal Gear Has Never Gotten a Real Ending, but Death Stranding Might

With Metal Gear Solid 5 being incomplete, and no plans on the horizon for a new chapter in the Metal Gear franchise, it would seem that there are a lot of loose ends that may never get resolved. Metal Gear may have always been a non-linear series— Metal Gear Solid 5 isn’t the last game chronologically—but many thematic elements, as well as major tertiary plots, have been left unfinished.

This is rather tragic, since the series had an almost three-decade-long run before being unceremoniously snuffed out, leaving longtime fans slighted and unsatisfied. But Kojima Productions itself owns the rights to Death Stranding , and it seems improbable that Kojima will be ousted from his own company, so the IP likely won’t suffer the same fate as its predecessor. Kojima also doesn’t plan to continue Death Stranding after the second entry, even though he has some ideas for a threequel.

It should be mentioned that Kojima hasn’t ruled out passing the torch to someone else, letting a new creative lead take charge with the Death Stranding IP. But even so, the franchise would be getting handed to someone picked by Kojima, rather than fading into a miasma of corporate-controlled intellectual property. There’s a sense that finality will be possible for Death Stranding , a luxury never afforded to Metal Gear .

Why Death Stranding Reaching Its End Point Is Important

Whenever Death Stranding wraps up, whether that’s with On the Beach or another, non-Kojima-directed sequel, it will be interesting to see how a Kojima property actually ends. With Metal Gear Solid , it feels like the door is always open for further development, with Konami simply waiting for the right moment, biding its time after the disastrous Metal Gear Survive . Naturally, many will view this as a good thing, but with the series unshackled from its original visionary, there’s a higher chance it will just be driven into the ground, milked for all it’s worth.

A good story needs a good ending—this principle is a big reason why long-running movie franchises and TV shows have a tendency to overstay their welcome, becoming less highly regarded with time. When done right, an ending puts a bow on a story, whether it be modest or epic in scale, letting the audience look back at the journey they’ve taken with a feeling of satisfaction. Metal Gear might never have this moment, but there’s still hope for Death Stranding .

Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected? Step by step, legendary game creator Hideo Kojima changes the world once again.

item.title: Release Time and Date for Dune Awakening
item.description:
Dune: Awakening is the game that will test players' abilities to survive on the desert planet of Arrakis, and with two blockbuster films and a prequel series for Dune all released in recent years, players are understandably eager to jump in. For those who can't wait, this guide will break down the release dates and times for each version of Dune: Awakening and show players when they can preload the game.

What Time Will Dune: Awakening Base Game Be Released?

The standard base game of Dune: Awakening will be released on June 10th at 16:00 CEST . Players can check out the table below for their own time zones. The release time is the same on all platforms .

L.A. - PDT

07:00 - June 10th

Mexico City - CST

08:00 - June 10th

Chicago - CDT

09:00 - June 10th

New York - EDT

10:00 - June 10th

Santiago - CLT

10:00 - June 10th

Sao Paulo - BRT

11:00 - June 10th

London - BST

15:00 - June 10th

Berlin - CEST

16:00 - June 10th

Dubai - GST

18:00 - June 10th

Beijing - CST

22:00 - June 10th

Seoul - KST

23:00 - June 10th

Tokyo - JST

23:00 - June 10th

Sydney - AEST

00:00 - June 11th

How To Play Dune: Awakening Early - Release Time For Deluxe & Ultimate Editions

If players don't want to wait until June 10th to explore Arrakis, they can preorder either the Deluxe or Ultimate editions of the game and play Dune: Awakening early on June 5th at 16:00 CEST.

It appears that players will still be able to preorder the Deluxe and Ultimate editions after June 5th and before June 10th, and thus unlock the game early. Preorders end on the 10th, but these editions still offer plenty of other content.

L.A. - PDT

07:00 - June 5th

Mexico City - CST

08:00 - June 5th

Chicago - CDT

09:00 - June 5th

New York - EDT

10:00 - June 5th

11:00 - June 5th

16:00 - June 5th

Dubai - GST

18:00 - June 5th

Beijing - CST

22:00 - June 5th

Seoul - KST

23:00 - June 5th

Tokyo - JST

23:00 - June 5th

Sydney - AEST

00:00 - June 6th

Don't worry about other players getting a head start on you if you choose not to get the Deluxe or Ultimate editions, as you'll be put on different servers. This is unless you wish to play with a friend who got advanced access.

Can You Preload Dune: Awakening?

With over 60 GB of storage required, players will be glad to learn that it is possible to preload Dune: Awakening . Preloading is available on all platforms for those who pre-order any edition of the game. This will be available on June 4th at 16:00 CEST , exactly 24 hours before owners of the Deluxe and Ultimate editions can start playing.

Preordering or preloading the standard base game does not grant early access. Owners of the base game still have to wait till the 10th to play.
